Package com.jubiman.customdatalib.api

Class CustomDataHandler<I,T extends CustomData>

java.lang.Object
com.jubiman.customdatalib.api.CustomDataHandler<I,T>
Type Parameters:
I - the identifier type (i.e. Long for players, Integer for mobs)
T - the CustomData type (i.e. CustomPlayer for players, CustomMob for mobs)
Direct Known Subclasses:
CustomMobsHandler, CustomPlayersHandler
public abstract class CustomDataHandler<I,T extends CustomData> extends Object
A handler for custom data

    • get

      public T get(I identifier)
      A null safe way to get a player from the map, adds player if they don't exist yet
      Parameters:
      identifier - the identifier of the CustomData object
      Returns:
